meanings.definition: A person who waits on tables in a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The waitpersons at the diner were friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant had a team of waitpersons serving the customers.
meanings.sent3: The waitpersons decided to have a race to see who could carry the most plates without dropping any.
meanings.sent4: The waitpersons were like graceful dancers, moving between tables with ease.
meanings.sent5: The waitpersons' smiles brightened up the whole dining area.

meanings.sent1: We need more waitpersons to handle the busy weekend shifts.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant hired additional waitpersons to meet the demand.
meanings.sent3: The group of waitpersons formed a band during their break time.
meanings.sent4: The waitpersons stood together like a united front, ready to tackle any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The waitpersons' uniforms were all neatly pressed and identical.
